title: RANKED QUEUES
body: Because of the ranked queues being disabled, will we get some kind of compensation? Normals is sooooooooooooooooooooooooooo boring because you play the exact same thing as you would in ranked and get nothing out of it. Ugh. How long until this thing is fixed?

replies.body:
Privilege? I think i've put enough money into this game to say I have the RIGHT to play it. 
And of course we should get compensation. I would be Gold right now if queues weren't down yesterday.

> ahahahahahaha.
> Oh wait, you're serious. Let me laugh even harder.
> #AHAHAHAHAHAHA!

Damn right I was serious. I got Gold the next day. Idiot.

Yes, because achieving a rank in a video game entitles you to special treatment...

PS: That is called sarcasm. I know it must be hard to tell for someone of your "special" requirements.
Why are you so mad? Do you not have a life?
I'm not mad, I'm just capable of realising that Riot owes us nothing (unlike you).
You're kidding right? You do realize this is a free game?
Think of it as a day off m8, then you can truly relax

> Because of the ranked queues being disabled, will we get some kind of compensation? 

You mean for a ***FREE*** game that Riot have given you the privilege (Not the right, but the privilege) to play? Of course not you twit.

> Normals is sooooooooooooooooooooooooooo boring because you play the exact same thing as you would in ranked and **get nothing out of it**.

Except experience, IP, fun, mastery points etc. You know, the usual "nothing".

> How long until this thing is fixed?

However long it takes for Riot to identify the problem and implement a solution. If they hadn't disabled ranked queues you'd be complaining about "unfair" games right now instead of no ranked.
